1: <pb/><t>Ol yal eb' chon̈ab' icha tic: Cotan̈ec e masanil, con̈ meltzajec d'a Jehová. A ix on̈ choc'tzilanb'ati, an̈eja' ol on̈ an̈tanpaxoc. Ix on̈ yac' echnajoc, an̈eja' a ol an̈tanpax quechen chi'.</t>
2: <t>A val yec'b'at chab' c'ual, ichato chi' ol yac'an co q'uinal. Axo d'a yoxil c'ual, ol on̈ yac'anpax pitzvoc, ol on̈ cajnaj d'a yichan̈.</t>
3: <t>Caq'uec quip cojtacanel Jehová. Icha cojtacaneli to ol sacb'oc, cojtac to ol jax d'ayon̈ tato sco na co b'a. Ol yac'cot svach'c'olal d'a quib'an̈, icha tz'aj syaxb'i sat lum luum yuj b'ab'el n̈ab' yed' slajvub' n̈ab'ilq'uinal, xcham eb'.</t>
4: <t>Icha tic yalan Jehová: ¿Tas vach' ol ex vutoc ex aj Efraín? ¿Tas vach' ol ex vutoc ex aj Judá? A b'aj tzin e xajanej, lajan icha asun d'a q'uin̈ib'alil, lajan icha yal ac'val d'a ayto sq'uin̈ib'i, axo sq'uin̈ib'i, satemi.</t>
5: <t>Yuj in lolonel ix vac' yal eb' in checab', ol ex in sateli. Nivan chequel ol aj eyaelal chi' icha val yoc c'u.</t>
6: <t>A val tas in gana tze c'ulej to tz'oc' e c'ol d'a eyetanimail yed' in eyojtacaneli to e Diosal in, man̈ocn̈ej e n̈usantz'a silab' d'ayin in gana.</t>
7: <t>A ex in chon̈ab' ex tic, maj e c'anab'ajej in trato eyed'oc, icha yutejnac sb'a vin̈aj Adán. Chuc ix eyutej e b'a d'ayin.</t>
8: <t>A eb' anima d'a chon̈ab' Galaad, an̈ej chucal sc'ulej eb', masanil b'aj ay chic' yuj b'aj smilvaj eb'.</t>
9: <t>A eb' sacerdote, icha junoc molan̈ elc'um yec' eb'. Smac anima eb' yic smac'anchamoc. D'a sb'eal Siquem smac'vicham anima eb', sc'ulanpax masanil chucal eb'.</t>
10: <t>A eb' aj Efraín ix och eb' ajmulal. Ix yixtejb'at sb'a eb' yed' eb' yetisraelal. Yuj chi' te yajb'entac yilji eb' svila'.</t>
11: <t>Yed' ex pax ex aj Judá, van sjavi sc'ual eyaelal.</t> <t>Tzin nib'ej tzin q'uex tas ayoch d'a yib'an̈ in chon̈ab' Israel,</t>
